name: A Pirate's heist
description:
Get in and get out! Steal the treasure and return to the boat.

Press R to reload the level.

All the art was made by me, but the music was from Pixabay.

My best time is 70 seconds, see if you can beat it!

I'm a 15 year old solo game dev trying to have fun on the long weekend!

Please give me constructive criticism!
